page.title: 09FISHERTON CHURCH - DUNURE
page.content: Fisherton Parish Church is 2 miles from Dunure built in 1839 on ground gifted by local landowner who also presented Church with Communion silver.Furnishings include font from former church of Kirkbride.Fisherton is linked with Maybole West Church (6 miles away).Minister resides in Maybole.A congregation of 280 communicants,Session Clerk, 12 Elders (men/women)and 18 on Congregational Board.Organist travels from Troon. Sunday School of 23 children and 3 teachers.Women's Guild started in 1961 has 30 members.Brownie Pack 12 girls. All groups meet in Kennedy Hall. Local bus runs in time for Church Service from noon until 1pm.No bus for return journey but private minibus transports older members once a month.Some villagers travel to places of worship in Ayr and Maybole.
